text: ==Predicted and scheduled events== ===June=== * June 22 - 50th anniversary of the Who Framed Roger Rabbit. ===Date unknown=== *The 2038 Winter Olympics will be held. == Events == * At January 19 2038 at 3:14:07 UTC, due to the year 2038 problem, Signed 32-bit unix time will overflow and revert to December 13 1901 at 20:45:52 UTC.
